oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Smith, Wayne E.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 2008 Convention SpeakersDon’t miss an exceptional group of speakers at this year’s American Federation of Aviculture 2008 Convention! Speakers and topics are subject to change. This partial list of speakers will be updated monthly on the AFA website at www.AFABirds.org.❖❖ Mattie Sue Athan:»» Retired BreederCockatoos - WhereShould They Go?❖❖ Laurie E.
